file_content.text: The Republic may've driven us off Corellia, but they'll never recover from what we did there.
Let's hope the general knows what she's doing on Corellia.
Anyone seen the commander?
Three more stretchers to the ship! Come on!
What's going on?
Evacuation, my lord. Eighty-first Infantry Battalion, just off Corellia.
Eighty-first Infantry, just off Corellia.
The war in the Core Worlds is over. We're pulling out.
What do you mean, we're pulling out? When I left, Corellia was under control.
We're giving up Corellia?
You've got injured. How many?
Your men are hurt....
About two dozen, but they're stable. Spacedock medbay is on alert.
An Imperial soldier does not abandon the battlefront.
You dare to flee? [Choke him]
My--my lord....
Who gave the order to retreat?
It was General Konya!
I took Corellia with my bare hands, and you lost it?
Pathetic ingrate! [Shock him]
Aaargh!
I didn't... the orders came from General Konya, my lord. Darth Marr himself appointed her.
After all our losses, and the chaos back home... now we lose Corellia.
That's the worst news yet.
General Konya's decision. Darth Marr put her in charge--she's got some new "strategy."
I took Corellia block by block. You couldn't even hold it a year?
You people are pathetic.
It wasn't--these were General Konya's orders. Part of her new strategy.
That's enough--check your feeds and get back to work.
Battalion Commander Mericci--sorry you heard the news like that, after what you did on the front.
With the problems in Hutt Space and Denova, supply lines are stretched thin... there's no way to sustain the Core offensive. But General Konya has a message for you.
What does the general have to say?
Let's hear your message.
I am the Wrath of the Emperor. Your general is bold to approach me.
Why come to me?
I am aware, my lord--but you are also a hero of Corellia.
I am a Lord of the Dark Council. I am not to be contacted lightly.
Why come to me?
No, my lord. But you fought on Corellia, and we remember you well.
I don't recall meeting a General Konya. Is my identity so public?
You know who I am?
You helped take Axial Park. A lot of us remember that day.
Your general knows how I take payment?
Is this a job offer?
She does--her forces fought alongside you in Axial Park.
If the general surrenders as soon as she's low on supplies, why should I care what she has to say?
That's no excuse for failure!
All I can tell you is that things are bad out there.
We're not abandoning Corellia without one last victory. General Konya stayed behind with a task force for a suicide mission.
If you or your forces can lend assistance, she asks that you come quickly--before your work on Corellia is undone.
Tell General Konya to hold her position and expect reinforcements.
On my way.
As you wish.
Let's see what the woman who lost the war has to offer.
I expect answers from her.
See to your men before I lose my patience.
Get out of my way.
Yes. Of course.
You heard the reports from the front? It's getting ugly out there.
